meanings.definition: One that enlivens or makes something more lively.
meanings.sent1: The music at the party was the perfect enlivener, getting everyone to dance.
meanings.sent2: The comedian was a great enlivener, bringing laughter to the audience.
meanings.sent3: The colorful decorations acted as an enlivener, brightening up the room.
meanings.sent4: Her cheerful personality was an enlivener, spreading joy wherever she went.
meanings.sent5: The energetic puppy was a true enlivener, bringing life to the household.

meanings.definition: To make something more lively or animated.
meanings.sent1: She used jokes to enliven the atmosphere during the meeting.
meanings.sent2: The dance performance enlivened the crowd with its vibrant moves.
meanings.sent3: Adding some spices can enliven the taste of the dish.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected plot twist enlivened the movie, keeping the audience engaged.
meanings.sent5: A splash of color can enliven a dull room and make it more inviting.
